messages.title: Lib Dems would back the Conservatives
messages.content: Clegg reveals Lib Dems are prepared to help Cameron get his Tories into power after the next Parliament election. Lib Dems backing Tories could slash funding for schools & the NHS.

messages.title: Labour's £1 million fund to slash youth unemployment in Watford
messages.content: Labour is pledging to set up a £1 million fund to help get young people back to work in Watford.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Claire Ward is a worker and a winner here in Watford… Support for hard working families.

issues.education: Lib Dems backing Tories could slash funding for schools.
issues.health: Labour's campaign to save Watford's hospital from Tory cuts.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Watford for 17 years with my husband and two daughters.

endorsements.endorsement: Claire’s experienced, caring and very supportive.

quotes.text: I want Watford to be a great place to work and a great place to grow up and grow old in.

images.caption: Claire Ward and supporters holding a banner.
Claire Ward at an event with citizens.
